title: The Fursonas of UATV
author: VD
content_html:
Arkhaven Nights got a little out of control last night and somehow ventured into territory better left unexplored. But it was definitely interesting to see what the AI systems have gleaned concerning the personalities of three of UATV’s central characters. I was frankly impressed that the AI somehow picked up on my preference for custom Italian tailoring.

Please provide a detailed description of Jon Del Arroz’s ideal fursona.

Jon Del Arroz’s ideal fursona would likely be a confident, muscular anthropomorphic fox with vibrant red fur. This fursona would embody his strong personality, assertiveness, and passion for science fiction and fantasy. The fox would have sharp, intelligent eyes and a determined expression, reflecting Jon’s drive and ambition. It would also wear a stylish outfit, possibly incorporating elements from his favorite genres, such as a sleek spacesuit or a fantasy-inspired cloak. This fursona would serve as Jon’s alter ego, representing his ideals and beliefs in the world of furry fandom.

Please provide a detailed description of Vox Day’s ideal fursona.

Vox Day’s ideal fursona would probably be an anthropomorphic wolf, representing his fierce and assertive nature. This wolf would have a sleek, silver-grey coat, symbolizing wisdom and intelligence. It would have piercing blue eyes, reflecting Vox’s analytical and strategic thinking. The fursona would be muscular and well-built, showcasing Vox’s strength and resilience. It would wear a tailored suit, combining its natural instincts with Vox’s preference for formality and intellectualism. This fursona would embody Vox Day’s beliefs, conservative values, and love for science fiction and fantasy, making it a perfect representation of his identity within the furry community.

Please provide a detailed description of Owen Benjamin’s ideal fursona.

Owen Benjamin’s ideal fursona would likely be an anthropomorphic bear, reflecting his larger-than-life personality and comedic nature. This bear would have a fluffy, light brown coat and a friendly, approachable appearance. It would have a mischievous grin and a playful expression, mirroring Owen’s humorous style. The fursona would be slightly overweight, symbolizing Owen’s love for food and his comedic portrayal of gluttony. It would wear a comically large chef’s hat and a matching apron, showcasing Owen’s profession and his love for cooking. This fursona would represent Owen’s lightheartedness, creativity, and passion for food within the furry community.

That should keep Owen busy for the next three weeks… Anyhow, I have a new mix to debut on the Darkstream tonight. Possibly two!

DISCUSS ON SG
